message: Hello üëã
Hey Gerd!
Hey Kaila
How are u
Thanks, what about you
Good thanks, long day today.
Ok
Where are you from?
I'm from Bali Gerd, how about u?
Very nice, I'm from Germany
Oh cool, which part
North Rhine Westphalia
Do you have family or friends in Germany?
No. But I was planing to go to Germany for studying before covid happen
What did you want to study in which city?
I was planing to go to Dresden
Have u been there?
No, I wasn't there yet. Don't you want to study anymore?
Did you study? How far did it get you? I see a lot of entrepreneurs who quit studying and start their own business. And most of them are happier than the people who studied around me.

I have not studied, work in a wooden factory, the work is difficult and is not paid well, so I started writing the script. If I can earn enough money with the script, I will make myself self -employed! Sometimes it's good when you study.
Hows the script writing going Gerd
In the next few weeks I have to take a break, I was operated on at the elbow, I have to wear a rail now, must not burden my left arm!
oh damn, that looks scary, why did u have to do that?
I had an accident at work, but that was not my fault, a colleague caused the accident!
oh that's extra annoying. will it heal fully?
In six weeks I will know how well it has healed!
I definitely have too much negative energy, I have to change that somehow!
How are you, how was your day?
Where is that negative energy coming from you think?
My day is good, was doing a bit of sports and hanging out with my friends
I've heard in general people in the western world are not happy, would u agree?
That is different! Many people do not do anything for their own well -being, they are often not doing so well! Then there are still people who do sports, healthy eating, they try to live a nice life!
U mean people have a work life imbalance?

Yes, many people go to work, their diet is not good, they do not do sports! These people often have too much overweight and are often sick. But these people try nothing so that their quality of life improves!
What is your dream job? Sometimes you have a wish as a child or later when you are older, what you would like to do and in which profession you would like to work. What is your dream?
I dream of becoming a dog trainer, I'm working towards that. What was your dream job as a child?

This is definitely a nice job! Do you do an apprenticeship? Oh, that was a long time ago, I think excavator driver, but when I was bigger, saw the excavator driving so slowly, that was too boring for me.
Haha thats very cool. That's a dream job for most boys I guess
How's the elbow doing
How are you doing?
I'm good, just bit busy today
Was okay today, in the morning a bit stressful with exams. but had a long nap afterwards and just did some baking, made two nice cheesecakes
and hows your day Gerd?
Unsupported message
Use the Instagram mobile app to view this message.
You like it when its hot like that? That's good news, just a couple more weeks.
Whats ur favorite type of cake? Then go to a lake or something to cool down, is there anything like that near your house?
This is a popular German cake! "Black Forest cake"
I do not live in the big city, only five minutes by bike, then I am in a nature conservation area, there are a lot of forest and water paths here, they drive with oil, salt and other goods!
I baked the bread and the cake in April 2022! I started writing the script in 2020, later I started baking with bread, a year later I started baking with the cake, but now I'm just baking bread!
Looks so yummy üòã.
Finally, I‚Äôve mustered up my courage to go public with my works ü•π.
Maybe you can also start a Patreon page!
When I saw your beautiful pictures, I thought you were a model!

The Patreon page is just to support me a little bit. It‚Äôs just 10$ per month for you but it means a lot here in Indonesia! Probably nothing for such a successful man like you. ü•π You can subscribe here now if you want to. It would really mean the world to me Gerd. https://www.patreon.com/Kailas_World
Get more from Kaila's World on Patreon
That would help me a lot because I am a bit financially stuck at the moment. ü•π Hard to create more content without a little bit of a financial income.

Sorry, I also have financial problems at the moment because registration for the whole film festivals cost a lot of money. The profits are just certificates and not money. I will only get my wages again next week, then I have to see if I can send you some money. Of course I would very much like to look at your works of art, but I will not register on my page.
You wanted to study in Germany, did you want to study art there? That also costs a lot of money or why do you no longer want to study in Germany?
I am trying to apply for a scholarship.
https://youtu.be/mV0v5GYIrMo?si=oU1W5UwqnwmIkQNj
Campus Tour - M√ºnster University
https://youtu.be/lvlxIMFfTPY?si=Rap6TksuOnfN6Ltm
University of M√ºnster image film - english version
https://www.uni-muenster.de/en/
University of M√ºnster

Thanks for all the information on the universities! Will look into it. sure, we can support each other on instagram! But unfortunately a pretty young girl like me needs more than just attention. Especially, in Bali and Indonesia, life is tough. And I am struggling right now to get by. I hope you understand that. Maybe you will find it in your heart to support me in other ways. Would very appreciate it. While getting to know you, you've already become a part of my life, you know üôÇ.

I try to support you more! Yes, I know that life in Asia is very difficult for a lot of people! I will try to support you more! I absolutely have to sell a script from myself so that I have enough money!
Thank you! I will also try to support you where I can. Good luck with selling your script!
Hi Kaila, how are you? I promised you that I will support you a little, today I signed up for your profile. I hope you are a little happier now.
Hello Gerd! Thank you so much, yes you made me very happy. Its sunny today here, no rain üôÇ how is your elbow doing darling?
I am happy when you are happy! I like it when you smile! Thank you, it will last for several weeks until I can move my arm properly again.
Aww thank youü•∞üòò do you already see improvement tho?
There is no improvement at the moment. The surgeon who operated on me said it can take 3 months before I can work again.
Today I only looked at your pictures briefly. How long have you been painting?
Photography also does, how long do you do that?
How's ur Sunday going?
How was your day today, what did you do?
I look a motorcycle run today.

quoted_text: Since I am a kid I always have been drawing and painting
message: Nice then you already have a lot of experience!

quoted_text: I think since I am around 16
message: Cool, you are very creative!
Hey Gerd! How was the motorcycle run watching? sounds cool! Had to move some stuff yesterday for a social project we are doing here in a village.. How's your Monday feeling so far? üôÇ

Hey Kaila, actually there were three motorcycle races yesterday. A race was in Germany. A race was in UK. Then there was also a women's motorcycle race in UK. The women don't have such a large audience, so they usually drive where the men also drive.
It is nice to hear that you are involved in social projects!
My day was ok, was shopping this morning, washed some laundry and rinsed down dishes! I hope you had a nice day today!
Three races in one day sounds intense! Glad you got to enjoy them all. How's the elbow recovery coming along with all that laundry and dish duty?

At the moment I can't do that much, so Sunday was a good change! I was at the doctor this morning. I can now slowly start moving my arm more. I'm just not allowed to lift, so a cup of coffee is much too heavy! How are you doing? I hope you have a good time!
Hey Gerd! That's great news about moving your arm more, just take it easy with the coffee cups for now üôÇ How's the scriptwriting going alongside your recovery?
Yes, I will take it easy! I've tried to write in the past few days, but I can only write with one hand, so I didn't try to write! I will try to write with both hands in the next few days!
Writing with one hand sounds tricky! Hope the script flows better when you can use both hands again. What kind of stories do you usually write for film festivals?

Yes, that's not so easy and my left hand is very painful. The doctor said yesterday until I have no pain, that can continue for a very long time. I am very confident that I can write a little better every day!

A young filmmaker from India asked me if I can write a script for an Indian horror short film for him. But he has no money and the story should be based on German mythology! I like people from Asia, so I agreed to write the script for free. The characters or rather, I took the characters from European fairy tales. So from the fairy tales "Little Red Riding Hood" and "Hansel and Gretel". The story takes place today. The filmmaker from India did not have enough money for production, so he didn't use my script. This is that short film script that takes part in several film festivals. The title is "red in the wood". I am still working on an action and a fantasy series.
I wish you a nice day
That Indian horror script sounds fascinating! Mixing German mythology with Asian collaboration is such a cool concept üòä How's the fantasy series coming along?

Yes, that was also my thought, I wanted to write the first script version and the Indian could have described the script that would really be a cool concept, but the filmmaker from India did not work on the script. The short film script was only 30 minutes. I rewritten the script alone, it is now a script for a feature film.

At the moment I am working on the action series! The Fantasy Series, I forget to develop the characters myself. I have already asked a few artists if they could draw the characters for me, but that didn't work because I would like to keep all rights for my characters, but nobody agreed!
I also want to do comics, look for someone who can draw the comics and I write the text and dialogues.
Expanding that short film into a feature sounds like a big creative leap! How's the action series development going alongside it?

Yes, writing a script of about 90 minutes is a lot of work. There are authors who needed up to a year to end the script! When the filmmaker from India contacted me, at that time I just worked on my action series. I only worked on the script for the Indian short film. What are you working on right now?

Hey Gerd! Sorry for the late reply, got caught up with my village project üòä That's awesome you're expanding the script into a feature film! How's the action series shaping up compared to your fantasy ideas?

Hey Kaila, no problem! With the action series, I have already finished four episodes. With the Fantasy series, I am still in the first episode. I have a lot of ideas when I am still looking for someone who can draw a few drawings for the characters from my Fantasy series! How do you work on, do you have enough time to paint and draw?

Four episodes already? You're on fire with this action series üòä Finding the right artist for your fantasy characters sounds exciting though, what kind of visual style are you imagining for them? Atm I haven found any free time to be creative, as we are all in this village now, today we were cleaning a river, hopefully its less stressful in the next couple of weeks.

I will write eight episodes for the action series, each episode goes 50 minutes, four episodes are already written! The Fantasy series, I write a script for the series, but I also want to make a comic about it, so series and comic! I hope that you will have more time for you in the next few days!

Eight episodes sounds like a massive project Gerd! You're really diving deep into both the action and fantasy worlds üòä The comic idea for the fantasy series is such a cool way to bring those characters to life. Hope the village work eases up soon so I can get back to sketching too!

Hey Kaila, yes to write a series, can last over a year! I have a lot of imagination, so it is no problem for me to write very different stories. I don't just want to write a script and make comics. I also want to make anime series! That's why I have been looking for a woman who can draw well for a long time and of course also loves anime! I hope that you will soon have more time for yourself! I wish you a nice day!

Anime series would be such a perfect fit for your scripts Gerd! Your imagination really shines through in how you describe your projects üòä Hope your elbow's feeling better these days, must be tough balancing recovery with all that creative energy! How has your weekend been my sweet Gerd?

Hi Kaila, yes you are right, I love to be creative, what about you? Thank you for your demand, you are always so friendly to me. My health is getting better every day! How are you doing? My weekend was ok, watched women's football, the German women's team won again! Then this weekend was a motorcycle race again! How was your weekend, did you do something interesting with your friend?
